About.paragraph: Suche is an executive search firm, based in Mumbai, providing niche Talent Acquisition services for leadership hiring across industry. Search has been an integral part of human history. This unquenchable thirst for knowledge, finding new frontiers and better way of living has led humanity to where we are today. In search we exist and persistently strive towards finding better opportunities through Research, innovation and discovery.

Services.name: Information Technology
Services.text: The IT Sector is central to the nation's security, economy, and safety as businesses, governments, academia, and private citizens are increasingly dependent upon IT Sector functions.

Services.name: Finance
Services.text: The financial sector is a section of the economy made up of firms and institutions that provide financial services to commercial and retail customers

Services.name: Pharmaceutical
Services.text: The pharmaceutical industry discovers, develops, produces, and markets drugs or pharmaceutical drugs for use as medications to be administered to patients .

Services.name: Automobile
Services.text: The automotive industry comprises a wide range of companies and organizations involved in the design, development, manufacturing, marketing, and selling of motor vehicles.[1] It is one of the world's largest industries by revenue.

Services.name: Hospitality
Services.text: The hospitality industry is a broad category of fields within the service industry that includes lodging, food and drink service, event planning, theme parks, travel and tourism. It includes hotels, tourism agencies, restaurants and bars.

Services.name: Marketing
Services.text: The Marketing and Advertising Industry Sector comprises companies providing advertising, marketing or public relations services. The Industry Sector is a classification that describes the activity of an entity within the economy.
